title: Generate Gaussian Random Numbers
description: In this lab, we will explore how to generate Gaussian random numbers using the Box-Muller transform in JavaScript. The purpose of this lab is to provide a hands-on experience in understanding and implementing a commonly used technique for generating normally distributed random numbers. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to generate Gaussian random numbers and how they can be used in various applications.

meta.title: Generate Gaussian Random Numbers with Box-Muller Transform
meta.description: Explore the implementation of the Box-Muller transform to generate Gaussian random numbers in JavaScript, with hands-on coding examples.
meta.keywords: javascript, gaussian random numbers, javascript practice, statistical simulation, javascript practice online, box muller transform, javascript lab, random number generation, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 生成高斯随机数
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何使用JavaScript中的Box-Muller变换生成高斯随机数。本实验的目的是提供一个实践经验，帮助理解和实现一种常用的生成正态分布随机数的技术。在本实验结束时，你将更好地理解如何生成高斯随机数以及它们如何在各种应用中使用。

meta.title: 使用Box-Muller变换生成高斯随机数
meta.description: 探索在JavaScript中使用Box-Muller变换生成高斯随机数的实现，并提供实际编码示例。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 高斯随机数, JavaScript实践, 统计模拟, 在线JavaScript实践, Box-Muller变换, JavaScript实验, 随机数生成, JavaScript教程
